name: Charon
description:
Overview:

Charon is a puzzle platformer, where the player can switch between the overworld and the underworld (if only it was as epic as it sounds.) However, when a temple is disturbed, the worlds are suddenly flipped (again, not quite so epic.) Long story short: you jump, you puzzle, and you platform.

Features:

  • Monochromatic pixels
  • Flowers
  • Art Stuffs

Controls:

[A/D] - Move left/right

[W/S] - Jump/switch

A Game a Week [Week 4]:

This game is my fourth game for "a game a week". Every week, I will force myself to make and release a (terrible) game. It's like a ransom, except games instead of hostages...probably. Stay tuned!
